sqls.sql: SELECT T."リストNO" AS listno, T."リスト名称" AS listname, mt.CONTENT AS listcontent, mt.COUNT AS num, "ステータス" AS status FROM "TRN_商品スキャン" T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM (trn."数量" ) AS COUNT, string_agg ( mst."商品管理番号" || '-' || COALESCE( mst."分類１" , '') || '-' ||COALESCE( mst."分類２" , '') , ',' ) AS CONTENT, trn."リストNO", trn."店舗ID" FROM "TRN_商品スキャン明細" trn LEFT JOIN "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst ON trn."LABEL番号" = mst."LABEL番号" AND trn."店舗ID" = mst."店舗ID" GROUP BY trn."リストNO", trn."店舗ID" ) mt ON T."リストNO" = mt."リストNO" AND T."店舗ID" = mt."店舗ID" WHERE T."店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY T."リストNO" DESC
delete from "TRN_商品スキャン明細" where "リストNO" = :listno and "店舗ID" = :shopid
delete from "TRN_商品スキャン" where "リストNO" = :listno and "店舗ID" = :shopid
SELECT DISTINCT "商品管理番号" AS value, "商品管理番号" AS text FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "length" ( 商品管理番号 ) > 0 AND "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "商品管理番号"
SELECT DISTINCT "リストNO" AS value, "リストNO" AS text FROM "TRN_商品スキャン" WHERE "length" ( "リストNO" ) > 0 AND "店舗ID" = :shopid AND "ステータス" != '2.棚卸済' ORDER BY "リストNO" DESC
UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" SET "LOCAL在庫" = :inventorynum ,"更新日時" = now() WHERE "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = :asin AND "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = :sku AND "MST_在庫情報"."店舗ID" = :shopid

INSERT INTO "MST_在庫情報" ( "SKU番号" , "ASIN番号" , "FBA在庫" , "FBM在庫" , "LOCAL在庫" , "途中在庫_入庫" , "途中在庫_仕入" , "暫定フラグ" , "店舗ID" , "登録日時" , "更新日時" ) SELECT mst1."SKU番号" , mst1."ASIN番号" , 0 , 0 , COALESCE( :inventorynum , 0) , 0 , 0 , mst1."暫定フラグ" , :shopid , now() , now() FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst1 WHERE mst1."商品管理番号" = :productno AND ( mst1."分類１" = :sub1 ) AND ( mst1."分類１" is null ) AND ( mst1."分類２" = :sub2 ) AND ( mst1."分類２" is null ) AND ( mst1."LABEL番号" = :label ) AND ( mst1."LABEL番号" is null ) and mst1."店舗ID" = :shopid
UPDATE "TRN_商品スキャン" SET "ステータス" = '2.棚卸済' ,"更新日時" = now() WHERE "TRN_商品スキャン"."リストNO" = :listno AND "TRN_商品スキャン"."店舗ID" = :shopid

SELECT mst1."商品管理番号" as productno, mst1."分類１" as sub1, mst1."分類２" as sub2, mst1."ASIN番号" as asin, mst1."SKU番号" as sku, mst1."LABEL番号" as label, COALESCE( trn."数量" , 0) as num FROM "TRN_商品スキャン明細" trn , "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst1 where trn."リストNO" = :listno AND trn."店舗ID" = :shopid AND trn."LABEL番号" = mst1."LABEL番号" AND trn."店舗ID" = mst1."店舗ID" ORDER BY mst1."商品管理番号"

SELECT mst1."商品管理番号" AS productno, mst1."分類１" AS sub1, mst1."分類２" AS sub2, mst1."ASIN番号" AS asin, mst1."SKU番号" AS sku, mst1."LABEL番号" AS label, COALESCE ( mst2."LOCAL在庫", 0 ) AS num, '' AS inventorynum FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst1
INNER JOIN "MST_在庫情報" mst2 ON mst1."親子区分" = '子商品' AND mst1."商品管理番号" = :product AND mst1."店舗ID" = :shopid AND mst1."店舗ID" = mst2."店舗ID" AND mst1."ASIN番号" = mst2."ASIN番号" AND mst1."SKU番号" = mst2."SKU番号" AND mst1."暫定フラグ" = mst2."暫定フラグ"
ORDER BY mst1."商品管理番号"

SELECT mst1."商品管理番号" AS productno, mst1."分類１" AS sub1, mst1."分類２" AS sub2, mst1."ASIN番号" AS asin, mst1."SKU番号" AS sku, mst1."LABEL番号" AS label, COALESCE ( mst2."LOCAL在庫", 0 ) AS num, 0 AS inventorynum FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst1
INNER JOIN "MST_在庫情報" mst2 ON mst1."親子区分" = '子商品' AND mst1."商品管理番号" = :product AND mst1."店舗ID" = :shopid AND mst1."店舗ID" = mst2."店舗ID" AND mst1."ASIN番号" = mst2."ASIN番号" AND mst1."SKU番号" = mst2."SKU番号" AND mst1."暫定フラグ" = mst2."暫定フラグ"
ORDER BY mst1."商品管理番号"
SELECT DISTINCT "リスト名称" AS name FROM "TRN_商品スキャン" WHERE "リストNO" = :listno AND "店舗ID" = :shopid
SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE( sum("数量") , 0) AS num FROM "TRN_商品スキャン明細" WHERE "リストNO" = :listno AND "店舗ID" = :shopid
INSERT INTO "TRN_商品スキャン明細" ( "リストNO", "LABEL番号", "数量", "店舗ID", "登録日時" ) VALUES ( :listno , :label , :num , :shopid , now())
INSERT INTO "TRN_商品スキャン" ( "リストNO", "リスト名称", "ステータス" ,"店舗ID", "登録日時" ) VALUES ( :listno , :name , '1.未棚卸' , :shopid , now())
UPDATE "TRN_商品スキャン" SET "リスト名称" = :name ,"ステータス" = '1.未棚卸' ,"更新日時" = now() where "リストNO" = :listno and "店舗ID" = :shopid
select "商品管理番号" AS pno, "分類１" AS sub1, "分類２" AS sub2, "ASIN番号" AS asin, "SKU番号" AS sku, "LABEL番号" AS label from "MST_出品マスタ情報" where "LABEL番号" = :labelno and "店舗ID" = :shopid
SELECT "リスト名称" as name FROM "TRN_商品スキャン" WHERE "リストNO" = :listno AND "店舗ID" = :shopid

SELECT mst1."商品管理番号" as productno, mst1."分類１" as sub1, mst1."分類２" as sub2, mst1."ASIN番号" as asin, mst1."SKU番号" as sku, mst1."LABEL番号" as label, trn."数量" as num FROM "TRN_商品スキャン明細" trn left join "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst1 ON trn."LABEL番号" = mst1."LABEL番号" AND mst1."暫定フラグ" = 0 AND trn."店舗ID" = mst1."店舗ID" where trn."リストNO" = :listno AND trn."店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY mst1."商品管理番号"

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" set "LOCAL在庫" = COALESCE("LOCAL在庫" , 0) + COALESCE(h.num , 0) from ( SELECT mst."ASIN番号" as asin , mst."SKU番号" as sku , trn."数量" as num , mst."店舗ID" as shopid FROM "TRN_商品スキャン明細" trn , "MST_出品マスタ情報" mst where trn."リストNO" = :listno and trn."LABEL番号" = mst."LABEL番号" and trn."店舗ID" = :shopid ) h where "MST_在庫情報"."ASIN番号" = h.asin and "MST_在庫情報"."SKU番号" = h.sku and "MST_在庫情報"."店舗ID" = h.shopid
